name: fedex-api
description: ``` fedex-ecommerce-integration/ ├── package.json                    # Dependencies and scripts ├── .env.example                    # Environment variables template ├── .env                           # Your actual environment variables (create this) ├── server.js                      # Main Express server entry point ├── services/ │   ├── fedexAuth.js              # 🔐 Authentication & Token Management │   └── fedexService.js           # 📦 Main FedEx API Service (TRACKING HERE) ├── routes/ │   └── fedex.js                  # 🛣️ API Routes (TRACKING ENDPOINT HERE) ├── middleware/ │   ├── validation.js             # ✅ Request validation schemas │   └── errorHandler.js           # ❌ Error handling middleware └── examples/     └── usage.js                  # 📝 Usage examples (TRACKING EXAMPLE HERE) ```
